about_the_game:
NOTE: We are rushing the release of our Steam page in order to get into the "Planes, Trains and Automobile" Steam Fest. We will be adding videos and updating the various contents as soon as we have new material available! Stay tuned and come meet us in the Steam forums ! :)

Sleepless Train is a strategic incremental game with a focus on relaxing scenery, forgiving gameplay and a contemplative original soundtrack.
Yes, there is a timer on the top of the screen; Yes, you could have been more efficient; Yes, you can grind for an even better performance.
But you don't have to: time will clean all of your mistakes so that you can enjoy the journey and still get to your destination.

THE JOURNEY

Sleepless Train is about a journey from a place where you feel incomplete, to the one you never knew you belong to. On your path you'll find five different environments, each with its unique style and challenges.

It is a long journey, and when you try to look at the finish line it seems impossible to reach. But patience and determination do make things better and soon enough you feel strong and fast and what felt unreachable is already passed by. And while new challenges will always be ahead of you, you learn to enjoy the journey as much as the destination.

THE TRAIN

The train is the heart of the game—sleepless because it never stops. It is your home, your office, your kitchen, your gym and the only tool that can get you what you want. You care for the train, you upgrade the train, you make it efficient, modern and beautiful. And you will be repaid with speed: Speed is what takes you home faster after all!

THE WAGONS AND THE MINI-GAMES

As you grow and upgrade your train, you add different kinds of wagons. Every wagon includes a unique mini-game for you to upgrade, optimize and beat in order to get the most out of it. You will have to carefully choose where to spend your resources and find the synergies to grow your resources faster.

THE PRESTIGE CARDS

Prestige cards are immensely valuable! You will unlock prestige cards as you progress in the game and each provides a unique boost that can be applied to one and only one wagon. As your build progresses, you may find a specific boost to be more valuable in a different wagon and suddenly feel frustration. And we don't want that: you can move prestige cards from one minigame to another as many times as you want!

ABOUT US

This is a single family effort! Husband on the IDE, wife on Fresco, Photoshop and Aseprite, son composing and playing instruments for the original soundtrack.

Sleepless train went from a crazy idea of developing a videogame completely in-house (literally!) to yet another way to come together as a family, support each other and express our creativity.

We hope you will like the game, we know we will get our dose of internet hate: regardless we are very proud of what we are doing, grateful for every minute players will spend in the game and most importantly loving every minute of the process!

Please reach out in the forums! The game is shaping more and more every day and we love to have feedback and ideas!

DISCLAIMER: No AI has been harmed (read: used) while developing Sleepless Train.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7200U @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Sleepless Train is an incremental strategy game with a focus on relaxing hand-drawn scenery, forgiving gameplay and a soothing original soundtrack. Unwind with the peaceful sight of a train in motion, unlock upgrades, exploit synergies and watch numbers go up.
